memories.content: Waves 1-10 COMPLETE (2026-01-14, commit f8381ce). Backend APIs, Market/Reporting, React Query, 18 UI components, E2E testing (258 Playwright), Performance, Security (RBAC, token blacklist, eval() RCE fix), LazyImage, usePrefetch, React.memo, VirtualList. Tests: 337 frontend + 1055 backend.

conda env: /home/mattb/miniconda3/envs/dashboard-backend. Backend port 8000, Frontend port 5173. Git: stash apply over pop, don't push unless asked. User prefers validation/testing before new features. No agent swarms for sequential dependent tasks. Be extremely clear about what actions user needs to take; state clearly if no action needed. User prefers directness over hedging. Dashboard purpose: comprehensive deal intelligence platform tracking ALL deals pursued (not just owned). Two currently owned deals: Cabana on 99th (Glendale, AZ) and Tempe Metro (Tempe, AZ). '4) Closed Deals' = currently owned, '5) Realized Deals' = sold/disposed. Do NOT expand extraction filter to older UW Model versions — different layouts would produce errors. Future task: group models by version for separate extraction. Kill port: use 'fuser -k 8000/tcp' (lsof -t may not work on this system). User is adamant: NO mock data, NO fake data, NO silent fallbacks anywhere. Remove all fabricated trend data (sine waves, etc.). Per-page review workflow: fix issues, then 3-4 parallel agents (visual validation, data integrity, TypeScript/lint, test coverage).

pydantic-settings 2.x: CORS_ORIGINS must be JSON array. Single .env in project root, symlinked from backend/.env. Shell env var SHAREPOINT_SITE_URL overrides .env with truncated value - MUST unset shell var before running extraction. Main DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data. Market DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_market_data (same server, separate DB). Cell reference file: Underwriting_Dashboard_Cell_References.xlsx in project root. VITE_API_URL fix: src/lib/config.ts always appends /api/v1 to base URL; api.ts imports API_URL from config.ts as single source of truth. Email domain: bandrcapital.com (NOT brcapital.com). CI requires: ruff check + ruff format on backend, tsc -b + vite build on frontend. Stale .pyc files can prevent --reload from picking up changes — delete __pycache__ when routes aren't matching. Redis warning (token blacklist) is harmless — falls back to in-memory store for dev.

SHAREPOINT EXTRACTION (2026-02-02): 28/28 files, 0 failures, 52.8s. 26 properties with extraction data + 3 monitored with none (Casitas at San Marcos, Cortland Arrowhead Summit, Town Center Apartments). NOI = ANNUAL PER-UNIT (multiply by total_units). Some UW models have bracket placeholders — _is_placeholder() detects these. Filters: FILE_PATTERN=.*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.*, CUTOFF_DATE=2024-07-15. Cash-on-Cash: LP_RETURNS_PREREFI_CASH_ON_CASH (rate), NOT EQUITY_CASH_ON_CASH_EXCLUDING_PROJECTLEVEL_FEES_YEAR_1 (dollar amount).

MARKET DATA PIPELINE COMPLETE (2026-02-04): All 5 phases done. DB dashboard_market_data on port 5432 with 253K records: CoStar 98,137 (MSA + 15 submarkets, quarterly since 1982), FRED 154,899 (17 series — rates, yields, Phoenix employment, CPI), Census 30 (Population + Income 2010-2024). Backend services: costar_parser.py, fred_extractor.py, census_extractor.py, scheduler.py (APScheduler: FRED daily 2AM, CoStar monthly 15th, Census annually Dec). market_data.py + interest_rates.py use 3-tier fallback (DB→API→mock). Frontend: interestRatesApi.ts calls backend API (removed VITE_FRED_API_KEY from bundle), all static disclaimers removed, sparklineData derived from API. Admin endpoints: POST /admin/extract/{fred,costar,census}, GET /admin/market-data-status. All endpoints verified returning source:'database'. 30 properties, 30 deals. 328 frontend + 1055 backend tests pass. Stage mapping: dead→closed_lost, initial_review→underwriting, closed→closed_won. 15 CoStar Submarket Clusters. Occupancy normalized 0-1 in API.
